about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

For all budding adventurers, the king of 3D dungeon crawler RPGs - 'Elminage ORIGINAL - Priestess of Darkness and The Ring of the Gods ' - has finally arrived on Steam.

The original 3D dungeon RPG has returned!

Create and raise your characters to defeat the monsters that lurk deep in the labyrinth-like dungeons. Its simple gameplay and sense of freedom makes you feel like you are truly inside a fantasy world.

Choose from 16 occupation including the likes of Fighter, Mage and Samurai.
With 9 races to choose from, diverse parties can be created set according to gender, age and their personality. In addition, customize the game to your liking with the graphic/sound functions.

With many events along the way, fulfill the main quest to search for the 5 rings.
Let's open the gates and head out to a new adventure.

About Configuration Settings
Opening the Elminage Original Config.exe file in the installation folder accesses key config, game pad settings, window size.
Alt+Enter changes between full screen/window
Alt+F4 closes the game.
detailed_description:
FACELOAD＆SOUNDLOAD

FACELOAD is a function where a player can choose an image they like and use it as a character's icon. Instructions 1) Place your chosen image in the folder 'My Document' > 'Mebius' > 'Elminage Original' > 'FACELOAD' The FACELOAD folder will automatically be created upon upgrade. Supported image file and size 192x192px JPG, BMP, PMG file 2 ) Start the game and select 'FACELOAD' 3 ) Choose a location to upload the image 4 ) The image in the FACELOAD folder will be shown. Select the image to upload. 5 ) The image should be ready. Press 'Z' to finish the process. Begin the game and when you go to the face list in 'adventurer registration' or 'change name' at the Training School, select FACELOAD on the bottom right icon where you can find your face.


SOUNDLOAD

SOUNDLOAD is a function where a player can use a BGM they like in the game. Instructions 1 ) Place your chosen image in the folder 'My Document' > 'Mebius' > 'Elminage Original' > 'SOUNDLOAD' Supported sound files wav. or ogg. 2 ) Start the game and select 'SOUNDLOAD' 3 ) Go to the sound page 4 ) The sound file in the SOUNDLOAD folder will be shown. Select the file to upload. Pressing PAGE DOWN adjusts the volume. Pressing 'F' returns the sound back to its original setting. 5 ) The image should be ready. Press 'Z' to finish the process. There may be parts of the image unable to be reproduced depending on the type/format of the file. Please seek approval beforehand. In the case SOUNDLOAD does not work normally, the steps below can return you to the original setting. 1 ) Confirm whether there is a BIN folder the 'Elminage Original¥SOUNLOAD folder'. 2 ) Rename, or if that fails, delete the SNLD.DAT in the BIN folder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win7/8/10
  • Processor: Corei7-860 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2.5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
  • Additional Notes: Monitor 1280*768　24bit

short_description: With simple gameplay, sense of freedom and even graphics/sound customization, create and raise your very own party of characters before setting forth across this fantasy world to defeat the monsters that lurk in the labyrinth-like dungeons in this 3D dungeon RPG.
